hooks.command:
xcodebuild build -scheme Eko -sdk iphonesimulator -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 16' ONLY_ACTIVE_ARCH=YES 2>&1 | xcpretty --color --simple || echo '
⚠️  Swift compilation errors detected - fix before continuing'
hooks.description: Run Xcode build after every file edit to catch Swift compilation errors immediately

hooks.command:
xcodebuild test -scheme Eko -sdk iphonesimulator -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 16' -only-testing:EkoTests 2>&1 | xcpretty --color --simple --test || echo '
⚠️  Tests failed - fix before continuing'
hooks.description: Run Swift tests after every edit to catch logic errors immediately
Validate project context has required sections
Validate implementation plan structure and test specifications

hooks.command: echo '✅ Phase implementation complete. Running architectural review...'
hooks.description: Notify that executor finished and checker will start
